name: ResetAtom
0:
”Alexa, turn on the fan”
”Alexa, turn on the tv”
”alexa, turn on the light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Control your Reset device using voice commands !

Instructions :
After Logging into your Reset Account, you need to discover your devices to start integration with Alexa.

You can turn on your devices by using the voice command "Turn on device-name"
You can turn off your devices by using the voice command "Turn off device-name"

You can dim your dimmable devices by using the voice command "Set device-name to percent percentage"
Example : "Set fan to 50 percent" for a device named fan

In the smart home section of the Amazon Alexa App, you can create groups and add devices to them.

Example : Consider a group named "Cabin" with two devices "fan" and "light"
"Turn on Cabin" will turn on all the devices in the group cabin

Note :
This skill requires the you to login with your Reset credentials and links the user so that he can control his devices using this skill. The login credentials will be used for the sole purpose of linking your account.
This skill requires a Reset hardware device
